title: Airplane!
director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
writer: Jim Abrahams (written for the screen by), David Zucker (written for the screen by), Jerry Zucker (written for the screen by)
actors: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Lloyd Bridges, Peter Graves, Julie Hagerty
plot: Still craving for the love of his life, Ted Striker follows Elaine onto the flight that she is working on as a member of the cabin crew. Elaine doesn't want to be with Ted anymore, but when the crew and passengers fall ill from food poisoning, all eyes are on Ted.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
name: Airplane!
